name: Lightning I
core: A first charge suggests recognition arrives quickly and should be met with alert discipline.
shadow: Quickness becomes agitation when every spark is treated as a command.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward swift recognition and immediate readiness.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests grounding the current before acting on it.

name: Lightning II
core: Paired signals suggest momentum builds when response is timely and the circuit remains clear.
shadow: Coordination becomes overreaction when one impulse triggers another without judgment.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward fast cooperation with explicit intent.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests checking the line before amplifying the exchange.

name: Lightning III
core: A stable circuit suggests intelligence and force can move together when routed with care.
shadow: Clarity becomes overload when too many paths are energized at once.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward directing insight into useful action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests limiting the active channels until the route is proven sound.

name: Lightning IV
core: Stored charge suggests power should be retained until the exact point of use is known.
shadow: Reserve becomes tension when no release is ever allowed.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward deliberate discharge at the right moment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests containment and insulation before movement.

name: Lightning V
core: A broken line suggests the current is being interrupted by strain, resistance, or poor grounding.
shadow: Interruption becomes panic when every break is treated as total failure.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward repairing the route so force can move cleanly again.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests shutting down excess load before restoring the line.

name: Lightning VI
core: Recognition and momentum suggest the pattern is becoming visible and can now be acted on with confidence.
shadow: Visibility becomes showmanship when recognition is prized over function.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward timely action backed by clear perception.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests separating the signal from the applause before committing further.

name: Lightning VII
core: Strategic voltage suggests force is most effective when applied in exact measure rather than abundance.
shadow: Precision becomes severity when the charge is sharpened beyond necessity.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward targeted effort and well-placed emphasis.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing intensity until the exact need is visible.

name: Lightning VIII
core: Rapid transmission suggests developments may move faster than caution prefers, rewarding prepared responsiveness.
shadow: Speed becomes fragmentation when force outruns coherence.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward swift coordination and decisive execution.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests taking one moment to secure the route before increasing speed.

name: Lightning IX
core: A sustained field suggests the current can be held if the system remains disciplined and well-grounded.
shadow: Sustaining power becomes strain when maintenance is ignored in the name of endurance.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward holding the line with measured confidence.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests checking the strain points before extending the field.

name: Lightning X
core: An exhausted circuit suggests the cycle is ending under accumulated load and requires release before renewal.
shadow: Exhaustion becomes collapse when no discharge or rest is permitted.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward clearing the line so fresh force can later return.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports discharge, recovery, and a deliberate reduction of load.
